entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:11 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
